mapper.sql: ID, CASE_ID, ACCEPTANCE_NO, REQUEST_TYPE, AGENT_FLAG, CREATER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, DELAYED_REPLY, CASE_AMOUNT, CASE_ADMISSIBLE_AMOUNT, CASE_HANDLING_AMOUNT, PAY_ID, STATUS, PAY_STATUS, PAY_END_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from case_request_info
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from case_request_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into case_request_info (ID, CASE_ID, ACCEPTANCE_NO, REQUEST_TYPE, AGENT_FLAG, CREATER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, DELAYED_REPLY, CASE_AMOUNT, CASE_ADMISSIBLE_AMOUNT, CASE_HANDLING_AMOUNT, PAY_ID, STATUS, PAY_STATUS, PAY_END_TIME, ARB_CLAIM, FACT, REASON) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptanceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{agentFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delayedReply,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{caseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{caseAdmissibleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{caseHandlingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{arbClaim,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{fact,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

ID,
CASE_ID,
ACCEPTANCE_NO,

ARB_CLAIM,
FACT,

update case_request_info
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCEPTANCE_NO = #{record.acceptanceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_TYPE = #{record.requestType,jdbcType=CHAR},
AGENT_FLAG = #{record.agentFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_ID = #{record.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELAYED_REPLY = #{record.delayedReply,jdbcType=CHAR},
CASE_AMOUNT = #{record.caseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASE_ADMISSIBLE_AMOUNT = #{record.caseAdmissibleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASE_HANDLING_AMOUNT = #{record.caseHandlingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_ID = #{record.payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_STATUS = #{record.payStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_END_TIME = #{record.payEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ARB_CLAIM = #{record.arbClaim,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
FACT = #{record.fact,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
REASON = #{record.reason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCEPTANCE_NO = #{acceptanceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_TYPE = #{requestType,jdbcType=CHAR},
AGENT_FLAG = #{agentFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELAYED_REPLY = #{delayedReply,jdbcType=CHAR},
CASE_AMOUNT = #{caseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASE_ADMISSIBLE_AMOUNT = #{caseAdmissibleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASE_HANDLING_AMOUNT = #{caseHandlingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_ID = #{payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_STATUS = #{payStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_END_TIME = #{payEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ARB_CLAIM = #{arbClaim,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
FACT = #{fact,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update case_request_info set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCEPTANCE_NO = #{acceptanceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_TYPE = #{requestType,jdbcType=CHAR}, AGENT_FLAG = #{agentFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELAYED_REPLY = #{delayedReply,jdbcType=CHAR}, CASE_AMOUNT = #{caseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASE_ADMISSIBLE_AMOUNT = #{caseAdmissibleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASE_HANDLING_AMOUNT = #{caseHandlingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAY_ID = #{payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAY_STATUS = #{payStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAY_END_TIME = #{payEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ARB_CLAIM = #{arbClaim,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FACT = #{fact,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update case_request_info set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCEPTANCE_NO = #{acceptanceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_TYPE = #{requestType,jdbcType=CHAR}, AGENT_FLAG = #{agentFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELAYED_REPLY = #{delayedReply,jdbcType=CHAR}, CASE_AMOUNT = #{caseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASE_ADMISSIBLE_AMOUNT = #{caseAdmissibleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASE_HANDLING_AMOUNT = #{caseHandlingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAY_ID = #{payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAY_STATUS = #{payStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAY_END_TIME = #{payEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT i.id FROM case_defendant c, user_info i WHERE c.card_id = i.card_id AND C.case_id = #{caseId}
SELECT agent_id agentId FROM case_agent WHERE case_id = #{caseId} AND litigant_type = #{litigantType}

SELECT cri.id requestId, cri.case_amount caseAmount, cri.case_admissible_amount caseAdmissibleAmount, cri.case_handling_amount caseHandlingAmount, cri.behavior_charges behaviorCharges, ( cri.case_admissible_amount + cri.case_handling_amount ) totalAmount FROM case_request_info cri WHERE cri.case_id = #{caseId} AND cri.request_type = #{requestType}
mapper.update: UPDATE case_request_info SET case_amount=#{amounts}, case_admissible_amount=#{theFeeFor}, case_handling_amount=#{Handling}, behavior_charges=#{behaviorCharges}, pay_id=#{payId} WHERE id=(SELECT request_id FROM case_approve WHERE id=#{approveId} )
UPDATE case_request_info SET pay_end_time=#{payEndTime} WHERE id=(SELECT request_id FROM case_approve WHERE id=#{approveId} )
mapper.select: SELECT i.sign_abri_protocol_mode signArbiProtocolMode, i.sign_time signTime, i.protocol_name protocolName, i.create_time applyTime, r.arb_claim arbiRequest, r.fact factReason FROM case_info i, case_request_info r WHERE i.id = r.case_id AND r.request_type = #{requsetType} AND i.id = #{caseId}
